title: One Way Ticket
overview: The story of crazy fans of superstars who go to any extent to promote their screen idols and their movies.  Kunjappu aka Jahangir (Prithviraj Sukumaran) is a jeep-driver who is a die-hard fan of Mammootty and also is the General Secretary of the Malappuram District unit of the Mammootty Fansâ€™ Association. They even sacrifice their own career trying to promote their favorite stars.
